```{r}
# Some random matrices and ensembles
#P <- RM_norm(5, symm = T)
P <- RME_unif(100, min = 0, max = 1, size = 100)
```

# Demonstration

```{r}
P_disp <- P %>% dispersion(pairs = .consecutive_pairs(nrow(P[[1]])))
glimpse(P_disp)
```

# Plots

```{r}
P_disp %>% dispersion.histogram(metric = "id_diff_norm")
P_disp %>% dispersion.histogram(metric = "abs_diff")
```
